Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell technology offers substantial potential for clean and efficient power generation.
Titulo: Stability of solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: The high operating temperature (700-1000 degreesC) is beneficial for co-generation of both electricity and high-grade heat at user sites, thus, increasing total system efficiency to above 85%.
Titulo: Stability of solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: However, the high operating temperature imposes severe restrictions on materials, which can otherwise be effectively used for construction of the complete device.
Titulo: Stability of solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Degradation of fuel cell performance occurs over a period of time and is related to the deterioration of material properties and interfacial reactions between various fuel cell components.
Titulo: Stability of solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: In this paper, a short overview on the stability of various fuel cell components in real operating environments is given.
Titulo: Stability of solid oxide fuel cell components
